description: This file is a React component for a dashboard page that displays and manages external service connections, including fetching data, displaying status indicators, and providing actions to validate or revoke connections.

classes.name: StatusPill
classes.description: Component displaying the connection status as a colored pill indicator.

classes.name: ActionButtons
classes.description: Component rendering action buttons for validate and revoke actions for a connection.

classes.name: ConnectorAvatar
classes.description: Component rendering the avatar for a connector, either an icon or initials.

classes.name: ConnectionCard
classes.description: Component representing an individual connection item with details and actions.

classes.name: DashboardPage
classes.description: Main component displaying the dashboard with all connections, handling data fetching and user interactions.

methods.name: StatusPill
methods.description: Displays a visual indicator of connection status with color coding.

methods.name: ActionButtons
methods.description: Provides 'Validate' and 'Revoke' buttons with attached handlers.

methods.name: ConnectorAvatar
methods.description: Displays connector icon or initials as avatar.

methods.name: ConnectionCard
methods.description: Renders details and status/actions for a specific connection.

methods.name: DashboardPage
methods.description: Handles data fetching, state management, and rendering entire dashboard UI.
